data.value: Trial Period (Every)

data.name: TrialPeriod.Help
data.value: These two fields are used in conjunction to enter a Trial Period. e.g 2 weeks, or 1 month

data.name: cmdManage.Text
data.value: Manage Users in this Role

data.name: valRoleName.Text
data.value: You must enter a valid name.

data.name: valServiceFee1.Text
data.value: Service fee value entered is not valid.

data.name: valServiceFee2.Text
data.value: Service fee must be greater than or equal to zero.

data.name: valBillingPeriod1.Text
data.value: Billing period value entered is not valid.

data.name: valBillingPeriod2.Text
data.value: Billing period must be greater than zero.

data.name: valTrialFee1.Text
data.value: Trial fee value entered is not valid.

data.name: valTrialFee2.Text
data.value: Trial fee must be greater than or equal to zero.

data.name: valTrialPeriod1.Text
data.value: Trial period value entered is not valid.

data.name: valTrialPeriod2.Text
data.value: Trial period must be greater than zero.

data.name: ControlTitle_edit.Text
data.value: Edit Security Roles

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About Edit Security Roles

Administrators can manage the security roles defined for their site. The module allows you to add new security roles, modify existing security roles, delete security roles, and manage the users assigned to security roles.

data.name: plRoleGroups.Text
data.value: Role Group:

data.name: plRoleGroups.Help
data.value: Select the role group to which this role belongs.

data.name: plRSVPCode.Text
data.value: RSVP Code:

data.name: plRSVPCode.Help
data.value: Enter an RSVP Code for the role. Users can easily subscribe to this role by entering this code on the Manage Services page of their user account.

data.name: plRSVPLink.Text
data.value: RSVP Link:

data.name: plRSVPLink.Help
data.value: A link that allows users to subscribe to this role will be displayed when an RSVP Code is saved for this role.

data.name: plIcon.Text
data.value: Icon:

data.name: plIcon.Help
data.value: Select an icon for the role.

data.name: DuplicateRole.Text
data.value: A role with the same name already exists. The role was not added.

data.name: ProcessorWarning.Text
data.value: Warning: The Payment Processor settings on the Admin > Site Settings page must be configured to enable fee-base roles/services.

data.name: IncompatibleFee.Text
data.value: You must select a billing frequency if you want to enter a fee for this role.

data.name: valRoleName2.Text
data.value: The Name is invalid - roles can not contain the following characters: & $ + , / ? ~ # < > ¿ ¡ « » ! . : * ' [ ]
